page.title: 12BRICK LEYS TOO,ROXWELL
page.content: I live at Brick Leys Too which is in our survey area. My Mum has to take me and my brother out of our area to school. I go to Roxwell Primary School and my brother Hylands School in Writtle. Our house is 400 years old and it used to be a Barn/Cow Shed. The 3rd house was the granary. We have a balcony at the back of our house where we wanted to build a 3rd bedroom but we were not allowed. So now we are having a bedroom in the dining room. We have a big kitchen that we are altering; the bottom end will be the dining room and the top end will be the kitchen. Before we started we had a wall up the top end of the pantry we have had that wall knocked down. It has made a lot of difference. My Mum works in Gt. Baddow and my Dad works in Chelmsford.
